text: tame kahi do ke tena para pana te ja sakti dharave che ke tamara para ko'i prakopa tamara uparathi mokali de, athava tamara taliyethi, athava to tamane jutha jutha banavi saune ladavi de ane tamara manthi ekane bijani lada'ini maja cakhadi de, tame ju'o to khara, ame kevi rite purava alaga-alaga rite varnana kari rahya che, kadaca ke te'o samaji jaya
